```css
// Property: locationServicesAuthorization
// Description: Returns an authorization constant indicating if the application has access to location services.
// Component(s): Ti.Geolocation
'.location-services-authorization-denied': { locationServicesAuthorization: Ti.Geolocation.AUTHORIZATION_DENIED }
'.location-services-authorization-restricted': { locationServicesAuthorization: Ti.Geolocation.AUTHORIZATION_RESTRICTED }
'.location-services-authorization-unknown': { locationServicesAuthorization: Ti.Geolocation.AUTHORIZATION_UNKNOWN }
'.location-services-authorization-always': { locationServicesAuthorization: Ti.Geolocation.AUTHORIZATION_ALWAYS }
'.location-services-authorization-when-in-use': { locationServicesAuthorization: Ti.Geolocation.AUTHORIZATION_WHEN_IN_USE }
```
